welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Birstall, a charming city in the United Kingdom known for its picturesque landscapes and rich history. We hope you enjoy your stay and take the time to explore all that this beautiful city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Leeds/Bradford Airport is where all domestic and international flights depart and arrive.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Terminal 2 is a smaller terminal used for low-cost and regional flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport for up to 2 hours.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Linton-On-Ouse Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Linton-On-Ouse Airport is reserved for VIP and private charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
